scripts.check: bunx biome check --write frontend && bun run tsc --noEmit
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run frontend:build && python build.py
scripts.clean: node -e "['build', 'gui'].forEach(d => { try { require('fs').rmSync(d, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ENOTEMPTY') throw e; } });"
scripts.init:windows: virtualenv -p python venv && .\venv\Scripts\pip install Cython && .\venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.init:linux: virtualenv -p python3 venv && bun run init:qt5
scripts.init:default: virtualenv -p python3.11 venv && ./venv/bin/pip install Cython && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.init:qt5: sudo apt install python3-pyqt5 python3-pyqt5.qtwebengine python3-pyqt5.qtwebchannel libqt5webkit5-dev && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.init:gtk: sudo apt install libgirepository2.0-dev gcc libcairo2-dev pkg-config python3-dev gir1.2-gtk-3.0 && ./venv/bin/pip install pycairo pygobject -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: bun run check && concurrently --raw --kill-others --success first --names "frontend,backend" "bun run frontend:dev" "bun run backend"
scripts.test: bun run test:frontend && bun run test:backend
